name: survey-target
title: SurveyTarget
description: A specification of a characteristic of dwc:Occurrence that was included or excluded in a Survey.

fields.name: surveyID
fields.description: An identifier for a dwc:Event that is an biotic survey.

fields.name: surveyTargetType
fields.description: The type of scope a SurveyTarget describes.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a controlled vocabulary.

fields.name: surveyTargetTypeIRI
fields.description: The IRI of the controlled vocabulary value for the type of survey target.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use an IRI for a term in a controlled vocabulary.

fields.name: surveyTargetTypeVocabulary
fields.description: The reference to the controlled vocabulary where the definition of the value for surveyTargetType is given.

fields.name: surveyTargetValue
fields.description: The value of a characteristic sought for the surveyTarget for a given surveyTargetType.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a controlled vocabulary.

fields.name: surveyTargetValueIRI
fields.description: The IRI of the controlled vocabulary value for the type of survey target value.

fields.name: surveyTargetValueVocabulary
fields.description: The reference to the controlled vocabulary where the definition of the value for surveyTargetValue is given.

fields.name: surveyTargetUnit
fields.description: The units associated with the surveyTargetValue.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a controlled vocabulary.

fields.name: surveyTargetUnitIRI
fields.description: The IRI of the controlled vocabulary value for the type of survey target unit.

fields.name: surveyTargetUnitVocabulary
fields.description: The reference to the controlled vocabulary where the definition of the value for surveyTargetUnit is given.

fields.name: includeOrExclude
fields.description: A term to declare whether an instance of the SurveyTarget is an included scope or an excluded scope. Combinations of SurveyTarget records of inclusions and exclusions can define complex scopes such as all flying adult Aves except Passeriformes.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is use a controlled vocabulary consisting of 'include' and 'exclude' only.

fields.name: isSurveyTargetFullyReported
fields.description: A declaration of whether the counts for an instance of the SurveyTarget report everything that matches the declared SurveyTarget. If they do, this enables inference of absence of detection for everything in that SurveyTarget that is included but that does not appear in the count.
